channel.title: Auxy Deleting Song After Importing Another Song
channel.description: So I don't know if this fits in this category. I was working on a song for a few hours and was sent a project link after opening said link and importing that song my other song that I had worked on vanished/reset. I've lost hours of work and would like to know if there's a way to get it back.

item.title: Auxy Deleting Song After Importing Another Song
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
My friend had this happen to them recently as well, it seems to be a really rare and specific bug. I’ll try to recreate the situation, as I’ve always had some glitchy shenanigans happen whenever I open a project up from a link for the first time in a while.

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy Deleting Song After Importing Another Song

item.title: Auxy Deleting Song After Importing Another Song
item.dc:creator: musicmakingmonkey
item.description:
It’s not in the backups. I checked that. It reset the project to one loop and the rest is gone (which was a lot since i was almost done with the song) But thank you, I’ll probably try to reach support.

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy Deleting Song After Importing Another Song

item.title: Auxy Deleting Song After Importing Another Song
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Probably best to contact support (don’t have my device handy believe it’s feedback@auxy.co).

The stuff you were working on isn’t in the backup section/folder?

Read full topic
item.source: Auxy Deleting Song After Importing Another Song
